mapper.select: SELECT O.OT_APPL_ID AS otApplId , O.APPL_ID AS applId , O.YMD AS ymd , O.HOLIDAY_YN AS holidayYn , O.OT_SDATE AS otSdate , O.OT_EDATE AS otEdate , O.OT_MINUTE AS otMinute , O.RET_OT_MINUTE AS retOtMinute , O.REASON_CD AS reasonCd , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'REASON_CD', O.REASON_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS reasonNm , O.REASON AS reason , O.SUB_YN AS subYn , O.OLD_OT_APPL_ID AS oldOtApplId , O.CANCEL_YN AS cancelYn , A.APPL_STATUS_CD AS applStatusCd FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_OT_APPL O ON A.APPL_ID = O.APPL_ID WHERE O.APPL_ID = #{applId} ORDER BY O.OT_SDATE

SELECT S.OT_SUBS_APPL_ID AS otSubsApplId , S.OT_APPL_ID AS otApplId , S.APPL_ID AS applId , S.HOLIDAY_TYPE AS holidayType , S.SUB_YMD AS subYmd , S.SUBS_SDATE AS subsSdate , S.SUBS_EDATE AS subsEdate , S.SUBS_MINUTE AS subsMinute , S.OLD_SUBS_APPL_ID AS oldSubsApplId , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(S.SUBS_SDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'S') AS workSdateShm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(S.SUBS_SDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'E') AS workSdateEhm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(S.SUBS_EDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'S') AS workEdateShm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(S.SUBS_EDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'E') AS workEdateEhm FROM WTM_OT_APPL O JOIN WTM_OT_SUBS_APPL S ON O.OT_APPL_ID = S.OT_APPL_ID JOIN WTM_APPL A ON S.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE S.OT_APPL_ID = #{otApplId} AND (S.CANCEL_YN IS NULL OR S.CANCEL_YN = 'N') ORDER BY S.SUB_YMD, S.SUBS_SDATE

SELECT O.YMD AS ymd , O.OT_SDATE AS sDate , O.OT_EDATE AS eDate , O.OT_MINUTE AS otMinute , CASE F_WTM_WEEKDAY(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_SDATE, '%Y%m%d')) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END AS sDay , CASE F_WTM_WEEKDAY(F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_EDATE, '%Y%m%d')) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END AS eDay , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_SDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'S') AS workSdateShm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_SDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'E') AS workSdateEhm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_EDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'S') AS workEdateShm , F_WTM_GET_WORK_HM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(O.OT_EDATE, '%Y%m%d'), 'E') AS workEdateEhm FROM WTM_OT_APPL O JOIN WTM_APPL A ON O.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.APPL_SABUN = #{sabun} AND O.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y'
